verses.roman:
prabhura 'śikṣāṣṭaka'-śloka yei paḍe, śune
kṛṣṇe prema-bhakti tāra bāḍe dine-dine

synonyms: prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śikṣā-aṣṭaka—of the eight instructions; śloka—the verses; yei—anyone who; paḍe—recites; śune—or hears; kṛṣṇe—unto Lord Kṛṣṇa; prema-bhakti—ecstatic love and devotion; tāra—his; bāḍe—increases; dine-dine—day after day.
translation: If anyone recites or hears these eight verses of instruction by Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, his ecstatic love and devotion for Kṛṣṇa increase day by day.
